episodes.title: How I Was Recruited at 14: My First Steps Into the Watchtower Cult - Introduction.
episodes.description:
Welcome to Witchy Goddess Reborn.

This is the first introductory episode in my new series: Escaping the Watchtower – My Life Inside and Outside Jehovah’s Witnesses.

In this video, I take you back to the beginning—when I was just 14 years old and first recruited into the Jehovah’s Witnesses in 1996. What started as a search for belonging and spiritual truth quickly became a slow descent into a high-control system that would shape—and nearly break—my entire life.

I share how I was approached, what drew me in, and how I came to be baptized as a teenager, not realizing the long-term emotional, psychological, and spiritual toll it would take. This series is about truth, healing, and reclaiming your voice after religious trauma.

Whether you’re currently questioning, newly awakened, or healing from a high-control religion or cult, you’re not alone. I see you. And I made this for you.

This series will explore:
 • Life inside the Jehovah’s Witness world
 • Emotional and spiritual manipulation
 • The BITE model (how cults work)
 • My disassociation at age 37 in 2018
 • How I reclaimed my spiritual power and rebuilt my life

If this resonates, please like, comment, and subscribe. Your story matters, and together we can break the silence.

Follow me on TikTok for shorter stories & updates:
@witchygoddessreborn

#JehovahsWitness #ExJW #ReligiousTrauma #SpiritualAbuse #CultAwareness #WitchyGoddessReborn #BITEModel #HighControlGroup #Deconstruction #HealingJourney #FormerJW #EscapingTheWatchtower
